about_me:
I am a product-focused builder with hands-on experience creating MVPs, developing full products from scratch, and driving ideas from concept to execution.

I specialize in identifying real problems, translating them into actionable product requirements, and building functional, user-centric solutions end-to-end.

My work includes launching systems like Bizstock, a multi-tenant inventory management platform, and delivering multiple MVPs that validate market needs quickly and efficiently.

My mission:
• Build products that solve real problems
• Validate ideas fast
• Deliver systems that scale

Vision: build a company (dragondevs.co) that creates impactful digital products, scales them globally, and consistently delivers value through innovation, speed, and disciplined execution.
quote: Simplicity is the key to brilliance
author: Bruce Lee
